title: Russell Wilson's and Deshaun Watson’s MVP Runs, Sam Darnold is BACK, and the 49ers Are Good | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Deshaun Watson and Russell Wilson are currently leading the MVP sweepstakes (2:00), the 49ers, Kyle Allen, and the Browns offense lead this week's Stock Up (18:00), and the Cowboys, Rams, and Eagles secondary lead Stock Down (31:45). Then we throw our challenge flags and predict tomorrow’s headlines (47:15).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
